勝るとも劣らぬ: (まさるともおとらぬ) - not at all inferior to; rival or surpass; compare favorably (with)
勝れた業績: (すぐれたぎょうせき) - outstanding achievement
勝れる: (すぐれる) - to surpass; to outstrip; to excel
勝れ物: (すぐれもの) - exceptional item; extraordinary product
勝利: (しょうり) - victory; triumph; conquest; success; win
勝利を収める: (しょうりをおさめる) - to gain a victory; to win
勝利又勝利: (しょうりまたしょうり) - victory after victory
勝利投手: (しょうりとうしゅ) - winning pitcher
勝利者: (しょうりしゃ) - (ant: 敗北者) winner; victor; conqueror
勝地: (しょうち) - beauty spot; scenic spot
勝報: (しょうほう) - news of a victory
勝山: (かつやま) - woman's hairstyle (Edo period) (made popular by a Yoshiwara prostitute called Katsuyama)
勝差: (しょうさ) - difference in wins (in number of games won)
勝得る: (かちえる) - to achieve; to win; to gain; to attain
勝手: (katte) - própria conveniência, seu jeito, egoísmo; arredores, ambiente, forma de fazer as coisas, própria conveniência, seu jeito, egoísmo; arredores, ambiente, forma de fazer as coisas; conveniência, facilidade de uso; circunstâncias financeiras, vida, sustento
勝手ながら: (かってながら) - (with noun+する or noun+をverb) to allow oneself to .../to take the liberty of ...; it is presumed that/(I, we) presume that; on one's own accord/by one's arbitrary decision
勝手に: (かってに) - arbitrarily; of its own accord; involuntarily; wilfully; willfully; as one pleases
勝手にしろ: (かってにしろ) - Have it your way; To hell with you!; Get rooted!; Bugger you!
勝手元: (かってもと) - in and about a kitchen; family circumstances
勝手口: (かってぐち) - kitchen door; back door; service door; tradesman's entrance
勝手向き: (かってむき) - in and about a kitchen; family circumstances
勝手放題: (かってほうだい) - (yoji) at one's sweet will; doing whatever one pleases; however one pleases
勝手次第: (かってしだい) - (yoji) acting according to one's inclinations
勝手気まま: (かってきまま) - (yoji) self-willed; (doing or saying things) to suit one's own convenience; oblivious to the convenience of others
勝手気儘: (かってきまま) - (yoji) self-willed; (doing or saying things) to suit one's own convenience; oblivious to the convenience of others
勝手知ったる: (かってしったる) - well aware of; know thoroughly; being familiar with (and thus feeling no need for restraint)
勝投手: (かちとうしゅ) - (ant: 負け投手) winning pitcher
勝敗: (しょうはい) - victory or defeat; issue (of battle); outcome
勝敗の数: (しょうはいのすう) - issue of the battle
勝敗の鍵を握る: (しょうはいのかぎをにぎる) - to have the game in one's hands; to hold the key to victory
勝楽: (しょうらく) - Cakrasamvara; Samvara; Supreme Bliss (tantric Buddhist deity)
勝概: (しょうがい) - beautiful scenery; splendid landscape; magnificent view
勝機: (しょうき) - chance of winning; way to prevail
勝気: (かちき) - determined spirit; unyielding spirit; will
勝着: (しょうちゃく) - winning move (go, shogi)
勝算: (しょうさん) - prospects of victory; chances of success
勝絶: (しょうぜつ) - (in Japan) 4th note of the ancient chromatic scale (approx. F); (usu. しょうぜつ) excellence (of scenery, etc.)
勝継: (かちつぎ) - winning game after game
勝負: (shoubu) - vitória ou derrota; partida, competição, jogo, luta
勝負は時の運: (しょうぶはときのうん) - victory depends on the luck of the day (i.e. it isn't always the strongest who wins)
勝負パンツ: (しょうぶパンツ) - "lucky" underwear (esp. panties), set aside for special dates
勝負下着: (しょうぶしたぎ) - "lucky" underwear (esp. panties), set aside for special dates
勝負事: (しょうぶごと) - gambling; competition; game (of chance)
勝負俵: (しょうぶだわら) - {sumo} bales forming the edge of the ring
勝負審判: (しょうぶしんぱん) - {sumo} ringside judge
勝負審判交替: (しょうぶしんぱんこうたい) - {sumo} change of judges
勝負所: (しょうぶどころ) - decisive moment; turning point; critical moment; win-or-bust situation
勝負服: (しょうぶふく) - jockey's racing uniform; one's best clothes (esp. for women), normally put aside for important meetings, dates, etc.
勝鬨: (かちどき) - shout of victory; cry of triumph
募って来る食欲: (つのってくるしょくよく) - rising appetite
募らす: (つのらす) - to exacerbate; to exasperate
募る: (つのる) - to grow violent/to become stronger/to become worse; to invite contributions, etc./to solicit help, participation, etc./to recruit (e.g. soldiers)
募債: (ぼさい) - raising of a loan; loan floatation
募金運動: (ぼきんうんどう) - fund-raising drive or campaign
募集: (boshuu) - recruitment, invitation, selection, advertisement, taking applications; raising (fundos, doações, etc.), collection, subscription, solicitation , recruitment, invitation, selection, advertisement, taking applications; raising (funds, donations, etc.), collection, subscription, solicitation; flotation (of shares, loans, etc.)
募集人員: (ぼしゅうじんいん) - number of people to be admitted or accepted
募集広告: (ぼしゅうこうこく) - recruitment advertisement
募集株式: (ぼしゅうかぶしき) - shares available for subscription; share for subscription
勢い: (ikioi) - força, vigor, energia, espírito, vida; influência, autoridade, poder, força, vigor, energia, espírito, vida; influência, autoridade, poder; ímpeto, momento, curso (dos eventos); naturalmente, necessariamente
勢いづく: (いきおいづく) - to gather strength; to take heart
勢いを振るう: (いきおいをふるう) - to wield power; to exercise authority
勢い付く: (いきおいづく) - to gather strength; to take heart
勢い込む: (いきおいこむ) - to brace oneself
勢ぞろい: (せいぞろい) - array; muster; line-up; full force
勢ふ: (きおう) - to compete; to contend; to vie
勢み: (はずみ) - bounce/spring/rebound; momentum/impetus/impulse/stimulus/inertia; spur of the moment/impulse
勢む: (はずむ) - to spring; to bound; to bounce; to be stimulated; to be encouraged; to get lively; to treat oneself to; to splurge on
勢力: (seiryoku) - influência, poder, força, vigor, potência, energia
勢力下に: (せいりょくかに) - under the influence of
勢力伯仲: (せいりょくはくちゅう) - (yoji) (the two sides) being evenly-matched in influence or power
勢力分野: (せいりょくぶんや) - (yoji) the respective (relative) strength of political parties; distribution of the number of parliamentary seats held by each of the political parties
勢力圏: (せいりょくけん) - sphere of influence
勢力圏内: (せいりょくけんない) - (yoji) within the sphere of influence (of)
勢力均衡: (せいりょくきんこう) - balance of power
勢力家: (せいりょっか) - man of influence
勢力拡大: (せいりょくかくだい) - (yoji) expansion of one's sphere of influence; increase in one's power (strength, influence)
勢力拮抗: (せいりょくきっこう) - (yoji) struggle for supremacy between evenly-matched forces (parties)
勢力範囲: (せいりょくはんい) - (yoji) sphere of influence
勢力関係: (せいりょくかんけい) - (yoji) power relations; balance of power (between)
